about.title: About Ahmet Özay
about.intro: German-Turkish journalist with over 40 years of experience in international reporting.
about.paragraph1: Ahmet Özay was born in Turkey and came to Germany in the 1970s. He studied journalism and began his career at Westdeutscher Rundfunk (WDR) in Cologne.
about.paragraph2: For over four decades, he reported from Europe, Turkey and the post-Soviet states. As correspondent, editor-in-chief and managing editor, he bridged cultural and political discourse spaces.
about.paragraph3: His work focuses on German-Turkish relations, the history of the Crimean Tatars, minority rights and the analysis of racism and discrimination in Europe.

items.question: What topics does Ahmet Özay cover in his articles?
items.answer: Ahmet Özay writes about German-Turkish relations, the history of the Crimean Tatars, minority rights, migration and integration, and press freedom in Europe. His work focuses on analyzing political and social developments from a journalistic perspective.

items.question: How can I contact Ahmet Özay for an interview request?
items.answer: You can reach Ahmet Özay via the contact form on this website. Please include the reason for contact, the desired topic, and your time frame in your inquiry. He will get back to you as soon as possible.

items.question: Where have Ahmet Özay's articles been published?
items.answer: During his career at WDR, BBC World Service, and Deutsche Welle, Ahmet Özay has published numerous articles, reports, and analyses. His work appears both on this website and in various media outlets.

items.question: Is there a way to be notified about new articles?
items.answer: Currently, you can visit this website regularly to read new articles. A newsletter function is planned and will be available soon.

items.question: Can I book Ahmet Özay for lectures or workshops?
items.answer: Yes, Ahmet Özay is available for lectures and workshops. Please use the contact form and describe your event format, desired topic, and timeframe. He will review your request and get in touch with you.

items.question: Which languages are supported on this website?
items.answer: The website is available in three languages: German, English, and Turkish. You can change the language at any time using the language switcher in the navigation.
